---
title: "Geometric Results Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rgeom-0.1.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Geom01Call <- stream_in(file("rgeom-0.1-Call-Revised-1211.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
Geom01Result <- stream_in(file("rgeom-0.1-1211_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Geom.01.OpenAI <- left_join(Geom01Call,Geom01Result)
Full.Geom.01 <- left_join(Geom01$params, Geom.01.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Geom.01.1211.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Geom.01$Outcome <- map_chr(Geom01$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Geom01Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Geom.01$Outcome)
Full.Geom.01.1211 <- Full.Geom.01
```

```{r}
save(Full.Geom.01.1211, file="Full.Geom.01.1211.RData")
```
